author: keithrozario
content:
Hi Rakter,


I don't know about your specific issue but I had a similar issinternetue with the starbucks here my home. It was to do with my connection settings.


Try the following: Go to the wireless connection on your laptop, then select properties->Internet Protocol Version 4->Properties...


And set the 'Obtain IP Address automatically'. If you had a static address there it may not connect to your new router with the new settings.


Let me know if that helps.


Keith
